job.title: Data Engineer Jr/Mid - 100K-140K DOE with Security Clearance
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Defense & Space,Computer Software
job.description: <ul><li>Minimum Active Top Secret Level Security Clearance experience in full stack development, including front end and back end<br></li></ul>coding and a thorough knowledge of the SDLC<br><br>experience designing and developing real time ETL architecture for real time<br><br>predictive analytics.<br><br>experience with Apache Hive, Apache Spark and Apache Yarn<br><br>Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or other business-<br><br><strong><u>Related Field Preferred<br></u></strong><ul><li> 5+ years of relevant consulting or industry experience</li><li> Interest in event streaming architectures, such as Apache Kafka</li><li> Creativity and innovation – desire to learn and apply new technologies, products, and<br></li></ul>libraries<br><ul><li> Prior professional services or federal consulting experience<br></li></ul>
